statements: SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role='user' AND email='john.doe@example.com';
SELECT id, username, role FROM users WHERE role='admin' OR role='manager';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'user' AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' OR role = 'moderator' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT MAX(id), MIN(id), COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE role = 'user';
SELECT * FROM quantum_users;
SELECT username, email FROM quantum_users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT resource_name, access_level FROM quantum_resources WHERE access_level > 3;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM quantum_users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM quantum_resources WHERE owner_id = '456e89b-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM quantum_users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT * FROM quantum_resources WHERE access_level > 3 ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM quantum_users WHERE username LIKE '%an%' AND email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT * FROM quantum_resources WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND access_level >= 3;
SELECT username, email FROM quantum_users WHERE email <> 'test@example.com' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM quantum_users;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM quantum_users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT email, role FROM quantum_users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT * FROM quantum_hardware ORDER BY hardware_name ASC;
SELECT hardware_name, location FROM quantum_hardware WHERE status='active';
SELECT * FROM quantum_users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM quantum_users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT hardware_name, location FROM quantum_hardware WHERE status='active' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, hardware_id, granted, grant_date FROM access_control WHERE user_id=2 AND hardware_id=1;
SELECT username, role FROM quantum_users WHERE email LIKE '%@company.com';
SELECT * FROM user_roles;
SELECT role_name, user_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM quantum_devices WHERE device_type='Quantum';
SELECT user_id, device_id FROM user_device_access WHERE user_id=123;
SELECT device_id, permission_name FROM device_permissions ORDER BY permission_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM quantum_devices WHERE device_type = 'mobile' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.role_name, d.device_name FROM user_roles u JOIN user_device_access ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id JOIN quantum_devices d ON ua.device_id = d.device_id;
SELECT d.device_name, dp.permission_name FROM quantum_devices d LEFT JOIN device_permissions dp ON d.device_id = dp.device_id WHERE d.device_type = 'laptop' ORDER BY dp.permission_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 2 AND role_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission FROM user_resource_permissions WHERE resource_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id INNER JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;

SELECT users.username, resources.resource_name, user_resource_permissions.permission FROM users INNER JOIN user_resource_permissions ON users.user_id = user_resource_permissions.user_id INNER JOIN resources ON user_resource_permissions.resource_id = resources.resource_id WHERE users.user_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
